hero_title:
International company
developer and manufacturer
of technologies in electronics
and software
services_title: We accompany companies that seek to integrate electronic technology and software without slowing down their operation or adding internal complexity
service1_text: We design and develop electronic and software solutions from the conceptual stage to functional validation
service2_text: We reduce development and time-to-market through rapid prototyping, DFM, and series manufacturing
service3_text: We integrate electronic and digital solutions in real environments: industry, agriculture, fintech, security, and more
business_units_title: We organize our solutions in different business units to adapt to the needs of each industry
business_unit1_text: Electronic design, firmware and custom software for projects requiring high technical specialization
business_unit2_text: Development and operation of secure, scalable electronic wallets ready for integration with banks and payment methods
business_unit3_text: Technology applied to the field for monitoring, automation and control of productive processes in rural environments
business_unit4_text: Electronic and digital modernization of industrial machinery without the need to replace existing equipment
business_unit5_text: Digital platform for access control and security in buildings, homes and businesses
business_unit6_text: Intelligent electronic systems for aesthetic and functional modernization of vehicles
business_unit7_text: Electronic management of access, presence and traceability of people in corporate and industrial environments
business_unit8_text: Electronic devices for sanitization of air, surfaces and liquids without the use of chemicals
what_we_do_item1: Design and development of electronic equipment for various industries.
what_we_do_item2: Development of embedded software and custom user/server interfaces.
what_we_do_item3: Support throughout the entire product cycle: specification, design, validation, and commissioning.
what_we_do_item4: Manufacturing of electronic equipment in small, medium, and large series.
what_we_do_item5: Technical support and continuous maintenance to ensure optimal performance.
how_we_do_item1_title: Rapid Prototyping and Time To Market (TTM)
how_we_do_item1_text: In-house manufacturing of printed circuits for rapid prototypes, reducing development times and time to market.
how_we_do_item2_text: We design with series production in mind: productive viability, cost and process optimization, and consistent quality.
how_we_do_item3_text: Productive ecosystem with THT and SMT assembly and experience in multiple industries to scale from prototype to series.
stats_description1: Electronic components assembled per month with ASSISI (in a single shift)
stats_description2: Industrial, automotive, aerospace, security, health, communications and Information Technologies
stats_description3: Experience in engineering and electronic assembly
projects_title: We work with companies from different industries, integrating electronic technology and software in concrete, measurable, and scalable projects
project1_text: Modernization of an existing line through control electronics, sensing, and visualization. Operational times were reduced and process repeatability was improved without replacing machinery.
project2_text: Design of associated hardware, firmware, and software, with rapid prototyping and functional validation. Scaled to manufacturing applying DFM criteria to ensure serial viability.
project3_text: Implementation of a remote access and management system, replacing physical keys and credentials. Security, user control, and event traceability were improved.
cta_title: Schedule a meeting with our team
cta_text: Tell us about your project and let's evaluate together how we can help you with custom electronic engineering and software
footer_description:
We listen to your needs
and design a custom solution
to take your project to production.
